name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】A ZOMBIE IDOL'S DREAM COME TRUE？! #KureijiOllie3D [qk0HSjgN5LQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Kureiji Ollie performs a high-energy dance and vocal cover of the song 'U'.
MC section where Ollie introduces herself in English, Indonesian, and Japanese, expressing her excitement about her 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: ZOM-BA-LA-LA!
subtitles.english: ZOM-BA-LA-LA!

subtitles.original: Super kawaii zombie idol...
subtitles.english: Super kawaii zombie idol...

subtitles.original: クレイジー・オリーです！
subtitles.english: ...K-K-K-K-Kureiji Ollie!

subtitles.original: And welcome to my 3D showcase!
subtitles.english: And welcome to my 3D showcase!

subtitles.original: Selamat datang di showcase Ollie!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Ollie's showcase!

subtitles.original: オリーのお披露目へようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to Ollie's 3D debut!

subtitles.original: Let's go! Zom-ly! I see all of you guys in the chat!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Zom-ly! I see all of you guys in the chat!

subtitles.original: Ollie lihat kalian semua di chat kok!
subtitles.english: I see all of you in the chat!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！
subtitles.english: Yaho!

subtitles.original: Wah, there's a lot of people watching!
subtitles.english: Wow, there are so many people watching!

subtitles.original: Don't forget to use this hashtag right here.
subtitles.english: Don't forget to use this hashtag right here.

subtitles.original: Yang nonton kan banyak kan ya, jadi jangan lupa pakai hashtag di sebelah sini ya!
subtitles.english: Since there are so many of you watching, don't forget to use the hashtag over here!

subtitles.original: 見てる人多いから、このハッシュタグも使ってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Lots of people are watching, so please use this hashtag as well!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please!

subtitles.original: Nah, dengan begitu bagaimana? Ollie's 3D!
subtitles.english: So, how do you like it? Ollie's 3D!

subtitles.original: I can move around now! Wey wey wey wey wey!
subtitles.english: I can move around now! Wey wey wey wey wey!

subtitles.original: Keren kan?
subtitles.english: Cool, right?

subtitles.original: もうどうですか、オリーの3D？可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: So, what do you think of my 3D form? Cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: And with this new acquired form, I get to dance while I sing now!
subtitles.english: And with this new acquired form, I get to dance while I sing now!

subtitles.original: I don't just do a boring karaoke!
subtitles.english: I don't just do boring karaoke anymore!

subtitles.original: I sang 'U' from Millennium Parade and Belle! Did you guys enjoy it?
subtitles.english: I sang 'U' from Millennium Parade and Belle! Did you guys enjoy it?

subtitles.original: Ya, karena sekarang udah 3D, Ollie sekarang udah bisa joget.
subtitles.english: Yeah, because I'm 3D now, I can finally dance.

subtitles.original: Ollie nyanyi 'U' loh! Gimana tadi? Keren nggak?
subtitles.english: I sang 'U'! How was it? Was it cool?

subtitles.original: さっきもオリーが踊ったよ！
subtitles.english: I was dancing just now!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとアイドルっぽくなってたかな？
subtitles.english: Did I look like a proper idol?

subtitles.original: I had backup dancers too! Danced with me but uh...
subtitles.english: I had backup dancers too! They danced with me but uh...

subtitles.original: ...they kind of ran off after we finished.
subtitles.english: ...they kind of ran off after we finished.

subtitles.original: Tadi sempat ada backup dancers juga, cuma mereka langsung kabur habis udah selesai.
subtitles.english: There were backup dancers earlier, but they ran away immediately after we finished.

subtitles.original: そしてバックダンサーさんたちもあったね。
subtitles.english: And we had backup dancers too, didn't we?

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげで『U』が盛り上がった！ワーイ！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, 'U' was really exciting! Yay!

subtitles.original: And look! I'm not just dancing anywhere! I'm dancing in what I call the...
subtitles.english: And look! I'm not just dancing anywhere! I'm dancing in what I call the...

subtitles.original: ...Ollie Streamland!
subtitles.english: ...Ollie Streamland!
